name: Super Nova
description:
Created for Trijam-86: The three hour gamejam

Yes, I'm aware that this game is basically shovelware

ARRRGH BLOODY HELL YOU DIN! YOU'VE ONLY GONE AND BLOWN UP THE FUCKING SUN!

Help Billy and the Bois escape from the aftermath of a supernova in their very own rocket powered Vauxhall Nova!

This game contains very strong language, please don't play it in the presence of children or your boss :)

Premade assets disclaimer:

  • The Space Skybox
  • The music
